name: Time JuMp (Shree56)
description:
A platformer game made in 12 hours for GamesPlusJam (Feb17 - 20, 2018). The theme was 'TIME'.

You need to take the bouncy ball to the finishing line to complete the game. There are time powerups along the way which will give you bonus time.

There are two levels currently, but I may add some more soon.
